## TemplateApply.remotes property

A list of URLs for template files.

To apply a template manifest file located at a URL, pass `remotes` with an array that contains the URL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remotes?: Array<{
        url: string;
        contentType?: string;
    }>;
```
